name: Tower of Cards (Rismo6)
description:
Tower of Cards is a single-player role-playing game in which the player must take the role of a recycle bin, the only heroic living being in a dark realm. In this dark realm is a mountain with a conduit. As the only kind-hearted being in this realm, the player sets off on an adventure to scale the mountain. Along the way, the player can meet ghosts, ghouls, and creatures. Through the native creatures, you can unfold the history and secrets of the dark realm. Stay strong, as the dark souls are proud, strong, and degrading, willing to do what they can to destroy the hero’s commitment to itself:  save all innocent souls.

The player is able two travel through an open world scene. The open-world scene is filled with cave systems, villages, mountains, and secret rooms waiting to be found. The mountain’s conduit is the remains of a tower, taller than the mountain itself. The tower attracted the attention of powerful creatures all over the land. Now that it is gone merchants have claimed the mountain and its remains as their home. In the purple plaza, the player is able to converse with the merchants and explore their shops. In the wild, the player can interact with objects, solve puzzles, and battle enemies in order to progress through the story. If the player ever feels lost he or she can speak to the wizard as a guide.

In battle, the player and enemy are able to attack the opponent through a turn-based battle system. When the player encounters an enemy the fighters transition to the battle scene. Enemies have a U.I. system that allows them to make decisions when in battle.

This game is ready for playtesting. 

Up: "W",  Down:"S",  Left:"A",  Right:"D".

Click action buttons to attack and heal when in combat.

Programmer: (Eddy Benitez)

Artist:(Junyi Yu)

Enjoy!
